[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]NaturesPlus, manufacturer and supplier of all-natural vitamins and nutritional supplements for over 40 years has announced a new partnership with one of the UK’s leading multichannel fulfilment and logistics experts 3PL, as they continue retail growth.

Since 1972, NaturesPlus have been a leader in the natural product industry, with a unique fusion of nature and science behind every natural vitamin and supplement product, the family-driven supplement brand has enhanced health and changed lives for generations of loyal customers around the world.

3PL will partner with NaturesPlus to support their global growth strategy, providing a range of multichannel order fulfilment solutions across consumer and retail platforms.

“Our commitment to the Health & Wellbeing sector, both in terms of superb housekeeping standards and top-quality handling and delivery services allows us to provide excellent support to Natures Plus,” John Scully, Business Development Manager at 3PL commented As they look to further build their profile in the UK and Republic of Ireland, we will look to provide logistics solutions that will support their growth.”

“We are excited to be working with 3PL,” Barry Gubell, Director of Warehousing and Logistics at NaturesPlus commented “They are the perfect partner to help grow our UK and Ireland Business”

To shop the latest range of NaturePlus health and wellbeing products, visit www.naturesplus.co.uk

About 3PL

Based in Wigan, 3PL provides multichannel ecommerce fulfilment & logistics to fast growing brands. As an end-to-end fulfilment solution, 3PL operates from over 250,000 sq. ft of shared user warehousing in the UK, supported by access to a network of global warehouses to support International expansion for its clients. Its fast-moving operations house over 9 million units of stock, across 32,000 product lines.

About NaturesPlus

Since 1972, NaturesPlus has been the natural product industry leader, with outstanding and effective nutritional products and overwhelming commitment to support customers, retail partners, and the natural product industry through education, training and political advocacy.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
